org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend

Class DefaultTopNMetricSpecHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.DefaultTopNMetricSpecHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpecHandler

    @AutoService(value=SpecHandler.class)
public class DefaultTopNMetricSpecHandler
extends Object
implements SpecHandler

    Default spec handler for top-N metrics. It handles all the default metrics, and can instantiate additional type-only metrics from META-INF/lenskit/topn-metrics.properties files on the classpath.
